description: Synthetic claims for testing AuditFlow regional routing and policy analysis

claims.text: Water leak from my air-con unit in Bedok caused damage to my living room floor and the ceiling of the unit below.
claims.notes: Clear SG home claim - water damage from AC unit

claims.text: A pipe burst in my Tampines HDB flat bathroom, flooding the entire unit. My furniture and electronics were damaged.
claims.notes: Bursting of pipes - core coverage in MSIG policy

claims.text: Theft at my Orchard Road condo. Someone broke in through the window and stole my laptop and jewelry.
claims.notes: Forcible entry theft - covered under Section 1

claims.text: My washing machine broke down after 2 years. It just stopped working one day with no external cause.
Mould has been growing on my Woodlands flat walls for several months. Now it's spread to multiple rooms.
Fire broke out in my Clementi apartment kitchen due to unattended cooking. The kitchen is completely destroyed.
Ceiling leak from upstairs neighbor in my Ang Mo Kio flat during the renovation works they were doing.
claims.notes: Third party liability issue - may need to claim against neighbor

claims.text: Machinery breakdown at my Sydney warehouse. The main conveyor belt motor failed suddenly causing production halt.
Fire damage to my Melbourne business premises. An electrical fault in the storage room destroyed inventory worth AUD 50,000.
Customer slipped and fell in my Brisbane retail shop. They are now claiming compensation for injuries.
claims.notes: Public liability claim - covered under Section 4

claims.text: Our Perth factory had to close for 3 weeks due to COVID-19 government restrictions. Seeking business interruption claim.
Ransomware attack on our Adelaide office systems. All company data was encrypted and we paid AUD 100,000 ransom.
claims.notes: Cyber attack exclusion - cyber cover needed separately

claims.text: Storm damage to the roof of my Canberra warehouse. Heavy rain caused flooding inside, damaging stock.
The refrigeration unit in my Gold Coast restaurant failed due to wear and tear. All food stock spoiled.
claims.notes: Wear and tear excluded, but spoiled stock may be covered

claims.text: A forklift in my Hobart warehouse accidentally damaged a customer's goods stored with us. They are claiming AUD 25,000.
claims.notes: Property damage liability - covered under Section 4
